pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Magma Block$(li)Iron Ore$(li)Amethyst Block$(li)Raw Copper Block$(li)Nether Quartz Ore$(li)Quartz Block$(li)Calcite$(li)Bamboo Block

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[285, 230, 50, 45, 30, 0]
This gem can be injected with tier 1 and tier 2 injector setups.
